description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The world needs you! Go to the flat roof of the building of the company avoiding to be spotted. Use your chameleon powers and adapt to the environment color, hide behind the obstacles, use the smoke bombs, whistles and other items to keep moving forward and get the documents that will save the city!
description.short: The world needs you! Go to the flat roof of the building of the company avoiding to be spotted. Use your chameleon powers and adapt to the environment color, hide behind the obstacles, use the smoke bombs, whistles and other items to keep moving forward and get the documents that will save the city!
